Assault: You may choose to mark 1 stress against this armour; if you do so, you gain mastery to Scrap on your next action.
Camouflaged: The armour is designed to camouflage the wearer in specific terrain; when they use Skulk in that terrain, they do so with mastery.
Concealable: When you attempt to conceal this armour, roll with mastery.
Implacable: Piercing weapons do not negate this armour, Devastating ones do.
Heavy: When wearing armour, you may not use the Scramble or Skulk skills to gain additional dice.
